dmca.title: Not your MobileMe, Apple
dmca.body:
Apple has  caused confusion by launching Mobileme after Babya, my company who  has  claimed to be the first with such a service.

They have a page at apple.cpm/mobileme. 

The accused company plans to launch and claim they're the first with "mobileme"-deliberately using our mobile Me brand name and web intergration, which we consider to be our trade secrets. 

We want Apple to cease using the name, cancel any trademarks as it will cause confusion and also potential legal issues. 

They have caused puiblic defamation  and hurt our company's operations by using the name in the press and print media. 

Additionaly, we asked  them to  obey  a NDA that covers "MobileMe" but chose to violate. 

If Apple does not meet our demands within 10 days, we will take  appropiate action.  

I have a good faith belief that use of the materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I swear under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
